title: Banner Saga 2 v1.0.20 Android
description:
The epic award winning story-based role-playing game continues its emotional journey across a breaking world. 
Lead your Viking clans across hostile country on the brink of collapse. Make bold leadership decisions, manage resources wisely and strike skillfully in battle to survive another day in the harsh wild.
Experience the epic story that took the indie gaming world by storm in Banner Saga 2!

â€¢ Viking mythology â€“ A truly epic setting inspired by real Viking myths
â€¢ Tactical combat â€“ Improved, turn-based battles demand precision and strategy
â€¢ RPG upgrades â€“ Level up your charactersâ€™ stats and unlock devastating new moves
â€¢ Hard choices â€“ Choose wisely in and out of battle as danger lurks around each corner
â€¢ Real consequences â€“ Permanent loss of characters will weigh heavy on your mind
â€¢ New characters and a new race â€“ New faces, including the new Horseborn race, join your epic journey
â€¢ Manage your caravan - Your role in building and managing your caravan is critical to not only your own survival but the survival of an entire civilization
â€¢ Evocative score - Soundtrack by Grammy-nominated composer Austin Wintory
Struggle for survival in a brutal and breaking world in Banner Saga 2, the merciless strategy role-playing game where your choices really matter.
Download Banner Saga 2 and begin your epic journey today.
